name: Strange Rain (KSBP)
description:
A minimalist bullet hell with strange physics with all graphic assets made using jsPaint with after effects using PixiJS. Made in four days (part-time) for Paint Jam.

Controls
Arrow Keys/WASD/IJKL - Move
Space/Ctrl/Left Mouse - Shoot

This demo is a playable alpha release with one level clocking in at over three minutes in length.

Known Issues/Bugs/To-Do
- Gamepads are only partially supported. Some gamepads may not work at all.
- Mobile is not supported as of now.
- Audio may stutter on the first play on older machines. Refreshing the page and restarting the game may fix the issue.

Potential Post-Jam Features To Be Added Later
- Mobile-friendly browser version
- Win/Mac/Linux versions
- Cleaner GFX + UI
- Additional levels
- Level editor*
- Additional gameplay modes
- Powerups + additional enemies
- Local multiplayer co-op*
- High score/leaderboards*

* Planned for Win/Mac/Linux versions only

Music by KSBP
Sounds include heavily altered samples from WangleLine's DATA HAMMER sample pack
